dict.acceptation: 有规律地，按时，照例，按部就班地；整齐地，有条不紊地；经常，不断地；定期地；

sent.orig: In final analysis, I am simply a cistern regularly filled, regularly drained.
sent.trans: 归根结底，我不过是一个蓄水池，定时装满，又定时排空。

sent.orig: Regularly send property source information. And regularly email to customers as per their requirements.
sent.trans: 定期房源信息发送，可根据要求定期发送电子邮件给客户。

sent.orig: Regularly reported the sales situation. prepared sales statements and submitted to Manager regularly.
sent.trans: 定期组织汇报销售情况。编制销售报表。定期报送经理。

sent.orig: You should do exercise combined with good rest, take medicine regularly and go for check-up regularly.
sent.trans: 注意劳逸结合，适当参加体育锻炼，坚持用药，定期复查。

sent.orig: If you do some light shoulder exercises regularly, you will find that it lessens the pain.
sent.trans: 如果您能有规律地轻微地锻炼肩关节，疼痛是可以减轻的。
